About

Software Developer. Raleigh, NC native. ShareFile (now Citrix), UserVoice, and independent software consultant. Co-founder at ERC dEX.

Specializating/Especially interested in...

TypeScript, APIs, Developer Tools & SDKs, React, real-time dashboards and applications, SQL, Ethereum, decentralized applications

Competent in...

Docker, Kubernetes, Continuous Integration/Deployment, Automation

Not interested in working with...

Pretty much any dynamic type language (vanilla JS, Python, Ruby)

Things I like other than software...

Table Tennis, Disc Golf, MUDs, Math Rock, NBA and College Basketball, Pool, Texas Hold 'Em
